name: Give Ilhan Omar a Gundam
description:
Congresswoman Ilhan Omar gets a Gundam to fight against ICE (U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement) squads under the rule of Donald Trump, shooting enemies and jumping platforms in a 8 bits/16 bits Run N Gun like game.

Controls:

  • Move: AWSD/Arrow keys or Left analogue
  • Jump: W/Up Arrow or A Button
  • Switch gravity: Shift and Control or X and Y Buttons
  • Shoot: Enter or B Button
